content: I'm trying to gather information about the resettlement process for my family, who will be arriving in Canada soon. Can you tell me what kind of support services are available to them, and if there are any organizations that can help them adjust to life here? By the way, I've been pretty busy lately, had a bunch of meetings and prep work for my own refugee claim hearing, which is coming up on March 20th - just got the call to schedule it last week.
